name: get_product_description
description:
This function is used when the user requires description product. For example:
1 - "... produk seperti apa"

product.description: The product name to be searched.

name: get_destination_country_profile
description:
This function is used when the user requires profile of destination country. For example:
1 - "Sebutkan profil atau karakteristik negara ..."

destination_country.description: The destination country name to be searched.

name: get_export_trend
description:
This function is used when the user requires monthly trend information of the value and volume export by product and destination country. For example:
1 - "Sebutkan nilai ekspor produk ... ke negara ..."

destination_country.description: The destination country name to be searched.

product.description: The specific product to be searched.

name: get_regulation_quality_policy
description:
This function is used when the user requires regulation and quality requirements about product in destination country. For example:
1 - "Bagaimana regulasi atau aturan atau syarat mutu ekspor produk ... ke negara ... "

destination_country.description: The destination country name to be searched.

product.description: The product name to be searched.

name: get_tariff_logistic
description:
This function is used when the user requires logistic information about product in destination country. For example:
1 - "Bagaimana informasi logistik ekspor produk ... dari kabupaten/kota ... ke negara ... "

destination_country.description: The destination country name to be searched.

product.description: The product name to be searched.

name: get_trade_representative
description:
This function is used when the user requires information about atase perdagangan or indonesian trade and promotion center office in destination country. For example:
1 - "Sebutkan atase atau perwakilan pemerintah indonesia di negara ..."

destination_country.description: The destination country name to be searched.

name: get_trade_dependence_index
description:
This function is used when the user requires international trade dependence of country. For example:
1 - "Bagaimana peran perdagangan internasional terhadap negara ..."

destination_country.description: The destination country name to be searched.

name: get_export_concentration_index
description:
This function is used when the user requires export concentration or trade direction of country. For example:
1 - "Bagaimana konsentrasi ekspor atau arah perdagangan negara ..."

destination_country.description: The destination country name to be searched.

name: get_trade_complementary_index
description:
This function is used when the user requires international trade complementary of country. For example:
1 - "Bagaimana struktur perdagangan negara ..."

destination_country.description: The destination country name to be searched.
